response.original_title: The Time is Now "To Make The Switch"
response.overview: This documentary scrutinizes the enduring political divide in America, spotlighting how Black votes are instrumental in securing office but often yield negligible returns, raising questions about the efficacy of partisan alignment.
response.tagline: "Unveiling the Power of the Black Vote: Beyond Partisan Lines"
response.title: The Time is Now "To Make The Switch"
